meanings.definition: The underside of a building component, such as an arch or overhang.
meanings.sent1: The soffit of the arch was beautifully painted in bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers installed the soffit under the overhang to protect it from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The soffit of the overhang told jokes to the squirrels passing by.
meanings.sent4: The soffit of the arch whispered secrets to the walls of the building.
meanings.sent5: The colorful soffit under the arch looked like a rainbow upside down.

meanings.definition: A material used to cover the underside of a structure.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter chose a sturdy wood for the soffit of the house.
meanings.sent2: The aluminum soffit was lightweight and easy to install.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat used the soffit as a hiding spot from the dog.
meanings.sent4: The white soffit gleamed in the sunlight, brightening the whole building.
meanings.sent5: The soffit material was so smooth, it felt like touching a cloud.
